GOLD.lore.de-DE:
[grey][yellow][ROUNDDOT] Klicke, um einen [yellow]Gold Key zu kaufen.

[grey][yellow][ARROW] Du brauchst [gem_purple]750 Gems um den Key zu kaufen.
GOLD.lore.en-US:
[grey][yellow][ROUNDDOT] Click to buy a [yellow]Gold Key.

[grey][yellow][ARROW] You need [gem_purple]750 Gems to buy the key.

EMERALD.lore.de-DE:
[grey][green][ROUNDDOT] Klicke, um einen [green]Emerald Key zu kaufen.

[grey][green][ARROW] Du brauchst [gem_purple]1000 Gems um den Key zu kaufen.
EMERALD.lore.en-US:

AMETHYST.lore.de-DE:
[grey][ROUNDDOT] Klicke, um einen Amethyst Key zu kaufen.

[grey][ARROW] Du brauchst [gem_purple]1500 Gems um den Key zu kaufen.
AMETHYST.lore.en-US:
[grey][ROUNDDOT] Click to buy a Amethyst Key.

[grey][ARROW] You need [gem_purple]1500 Gems to buy the key.
